Thank you for taking the time to report a bug in the **YouTube-AI-Navigator-Browser-Extension**! Your efforts help improve the quality and stability of the project.

Please provide as much detail as possible following this template. If you have questions, please refer to our [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/chirag127/YouTube-AI-Navigator-Browser-Extension/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).
